description:
Hi my name is Mike Mangialardi and I'm a dieting fanatic. I am an elite powerlifter in the 181, drug tested division. In the off-season, I have to focus on gaining size and strength, yet staying lean. When I get closer to a competition, I usually have to drop about 10 to 15 pounds. Because of this experience, I have become enthusiastic about finding a dieting approach that is easy to follow and backed by science. Unfortunately such a thing is hard to come by.

The truth is that most diets are complex, overly-restrictive, and ineffective. We are saturated with different dieting fads that have brought about unneeded frustrations, struggles, and restrictions. On the other hand, am I offering a supposed shortcut to dieting? No. All dieting will take hard work and consistency to be effective. However, it also doesn't need to be so strict and inflexible.

So what will my course entail?

In my course I will teach you how dieting actually works. Moreover, I will walk you step by step to getting on track to lose fat successfully.

Here's what I am guaranteeing you will walk away with:

  • A understanding of how dieting actually works
  • An ability to track your calories to ensure fat loss and keep you accountable
  • A motivation and confidence to diet with long term success
  • An enjoyment in your fat loss efforts

If you take the time to do my course, I will take the time to keep in contact with you. Whether its answering your questions, giving encouragement, or reaching out to you to keep you accountable I will aid you throughout your fat loss journey.

So join with me on a fat loss journey full of success and enjoyment with this simple, flexible, and effective dieting approach.
title: Lose Weight and Not Your Favorite Foods
